text: Territorial Assembly elections were held in Moyen-Congo in 1952. The Congolese Progressive Party emerged as the largest faction, winning 17 seats in the second college.Dolf Sternberger, Bernhard Vogel, Dieter Nohlen & Klaus Landfried (1978) Die Wahl der Parlamente: Band II: Afrika, Erster Halbband, p1021 ==Electoral system== The 37 members of the Territorial Assembly were elected in two colleges; the first college elected 13 members and the second elected 24. ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !rowspan=2|Party !colspan=3|First college !colspan=3|Second college !rowspan=2|Total seats |- !Votes !% !Seats !Votes !% !Seats |- |align=left|Congolese Progressive Party|| || || || || ||17|| |- |align=left|French Section of the Workers' International|| || || || || ||7|| |- |align=left|Total|| || ||13|| || ||24||37 |- |align=left colspan=8|Source: Sternberger et al. |} ==References== Category:1952 elections in Africa Category:1952 in Moyen-Congo 1952
title: 1952 Moyen-Congo Territorial Assembly election
